welcome_message_body: Welcome to Edinburgh, a city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant arts scene. We invite you to explore our charming streets, enjoy our world-class festivals, and immerse yourself in all that this incredible city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: The Holyrood 9A
restaurants.description: The Holyrood 9A is a gastropub located in Edinburgh.
restaurants.address: 9A Holyrood Rd, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, EH8 8AE

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Edinburgh Airport serves mainly low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Perth Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Perth Airport handles freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
